job_tasks.phrase: Support data analysts in creating high-quality datasets using best practices in DBT, BigQuery, and Looker.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the creation and maintenance of datasets, which falls under data engineering principles.

job_tasks.phrase: Spearhead the creation and maintenance of a central LookML data model, the cornerstone of our vision to empower every business user with a personalized data analyst through Generative AI.
job_tasks.justification: Building and maintaining a data model (LookML) within a broader vision of enabling users with Generative AI points to software development efforts for data-driven applications.

job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate with other IT teams to enhance real-time data using supported ingestion patterns.
job_tasks.justification: Enhancing real-time data using ingestion patterns is a core data engineering responsibility.

job_tasks.phrase: Drive continuous and iterative improvement of our data platform.
job_tasks.justification: Improving and iterating on a data platform implies operational management and enhancement of data infrastructure.

job_tasks.phrase: Empower colleagues to embrace a more data-driven approach by enabling them to work effectively on the platform.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase highlights enabling colleagues and promoting a data-driven approach, indicating an understanding of business goals and user enablement.

soft_skills.phrase: Empower colleagues to embrace a more data-driven approach by enabling them to work effectively on the platform.
Spearhead the creation and maintenance of a central LookML data model
Drive continuous and iterative improvement of our data platform.

classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on data engineering tasks and the utilization of data platforms like BigQuery and Looker. While 'Generative AI' is mentioned as an end goal, the core responsibilities and extracted phrases do not demonstrate deep engagement with generative model development, fine-tuning, or advanced prompt engineering.
